data.comment: The big names in today's match at St James' Park have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Newcastle drive forward through Callum Wilson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 3, Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Joelinton's header is off-target for Newcastle.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Paul Tierney signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Newcastle's area.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Liverpool.
Newcastle attack but Callum Wilson's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
In the minute 7, Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In the minute 8, Important block from the Newcastle defence as Fabinho fires in a strike for Liverpool.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Liverpool push forward at St James' Park and James Milner gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Newcastle defence.
In the minute 9, Paul Tierney blows against Liverpool's Mohamed Salah for offside.
Paul Tierney awards Liverpool a goal kick.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 11, Roberto Firmino of Liverpool smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Liverpool.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 12, Ciaran Clark (Newcastle) has received a first yellow card.
Newcastle drives forward and Callum Wilson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
In the minute 13, Newcastle's Fabian Schar is whistled for offside at St James' Park.
Paul Tierney signals a Liverpool throw-in in Newcastle's half.
Free kick Liverpool.
In the minute 16, Liverpool's James Milner gets in a shot on goal at St James' Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Newcastle's DeAndre Yedlin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Liverpool defender.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Newcastle upon Tyne to check on Andrew Robertson, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Newcastle have a dangerous throw-in.
Andrew Robertson is back on the pitch.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Liverpool at St James' Park.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 22, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Newcastle in Newcastle upon Tyne.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Paul Tierney signals a Liverpool throw-in in Newcastle's half.
Liverpool pushes forward through Trent Alexander-Arnold, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Liverpool.
Newcastle to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Newcastle's Isaac Hayden breaks free at St James' Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 34, Mohamed Salah gets his shot on target but fails to score for Liverpool.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 37, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In the minute 39, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, Jacob Murphy for Newcastle drives towards goal at St James' Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Paul Tierney signals a Liverpool throw-in in Newcastle's half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
Throw-in for Liverpool at St James' Park.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Liverpool's Roberto Firmino goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
The first-half has come to a close in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at St James' Park.
Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
In the minute 47, Free kick Newcastle.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 48, Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Liverpool.
Fabinho (Liverpool) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 50, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 54, Liverpool surge into the attack at St James' Park but Sadio Mane’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Liverpool's Mohamed Salah is caught offside.
In the minute 57, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Sadio Mane of Liverpool is pulled up for offside.
Newcastle needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 61, Throw-in Newcastle.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Newcastle.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 65, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
James Milner (Liverpool) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 66, In Newcastle upon Tyne Liverpool attack through Mohamed Salah. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Miguel Almiron is replacing Jacob Murphy for the home team.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Liverpool's Roberto Firmino attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 68, Paul Tierney awards Newcastle a goal kick.
In the minute 68, The away team replace Curtis Jones with Georginio Wijnaldum.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 70, Newcastle drive forward but Miguel Almiron is judged offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 72, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Liverpool's Jordan Henderson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In the minute 73, Jurgen Klopp (Liverpool) is making a second substitution, with Thiago Alcantara replacing James Milner.
Attention is being given to Newcastle’s Fabian Schar and play has been suspended briefly.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 75, Fabian Schar for Newcastle is back on the field again.
Free kick Liverpool.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Liverpool just outside Newcastle's area.
In the minute 78, Thiago Alcantara (Liverpool) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Newcastle.
Nathaniel Phillips for Liverpool has been booked by Paul Tierney and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 79, Ciaran Clark (Newcastle) strikes at St James' Park but his header is cleared.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
In Newcastle upon Tyne, Joelinton of Newcastle is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 81, Paul Tierney signals a Liverpool throw-in in Newcastle's half.
Liverpool's Sadio Mane is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
In the minute 83, Trent Alexander-Arnold for the away team is judged to be offside.
Liverpool's Georginio Wijnaldum is on target but unsuccessful.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Liverpool.
In the minute 85, Isaac Hayden is booked for the home team.
Newcastle make their second substitution with Jamal Lewis replacing Matt Ritchie.
Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Liverpool pushes forward through Roberto Firmino, whose finish on goal is saved.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Newcastle.
Paul Tierney signals a Newcastle throw-in in Liverpool's half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
The away team have replaced Mohamed Salah with Xherdan Shaqiri. This is the third substitution made today by Jurgen Klopp.
